name: Carrot Cake Overnight Oats
description: These carrot cake overnight oats with chia seeds, walnuts, and coconut flakes are so delicious and super easy to make. Plus, they're incredibly healthy!
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup grated carrot ((about one small to medium carrot))
1-2 teaspoons agave or maple syrup (depending on how sweet you want them)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine all ingredients except for the walnuts and the coconut flakes. Cover and refrigerate overnight until the almond milk is completely absorbed.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, combine all ingredients except for the walnuts and the coconut flakes. Cover and refrigerate overnight until the almond milk is completely absorbed.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with chopped walnuts and coconut flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with chopped walnuts and coconut flakes.
